entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS
THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE MID 50S IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
